snippet: The Nets wiped out deficits in both halves, but a flurry of bad jumpers and turnovers in the fourth quarter proved too costly against the Bulls.
lead_paragraph: The Nets wiped out deficits in both halves, but a flurry of bad jumpers and turnovers in the fourth quarter proved too costly against the Bulls.

headline.seo: Nets Allow Bulls to Take Away the Ball and a Victory
headline.main: After Battling Back, Nets Allow Bulls to Take Away the Ball and a Victory
headline.print_headline: Leading Late, Nets Allow Bulls to Take the Ball, the Momentum and a Victory
